feed.title: Paperless GPT Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Pagination for history
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Implement pagination for modification history retrieval and update fr… by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/162
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-router-dom to v6.29.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/168
  • chore(deps): update dependency go to v1.23.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/155
  • chore(deps): update react monorepo by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/79
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/143
  • chore(deps): update dependency @playwright/test to v1.50.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/175
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v22.13.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/149
  • fix(deps): update dependency @heroicons/react to v2.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/92
  • chore(deps): update eslint monorepo to v9.19.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/87
  • chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.23.5 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/152
  • chore(deps): update dependency node-fetch to v3.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/176
  • fix: update Docker image tag logic for pull requests and tags by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/177
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript-eslint to v8.22.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/86

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Embed web app into binary (and updates)
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency testcontainers to v10.17.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/179
  • feat: restructure Dockerfile to build Vite frontend and embed assets … by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/178
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-router-dom to v7 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/183
  • chore(deps): update postgres docker tag to v17 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/182
  • fix(deps): update langchaingo to v0.1.13-pre.0.0.20250202074804-06727… by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/185
  • fix(deps): update react monorepo to v19 (major) by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/184
  • chore(deps): update node.js to v22 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/181

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.10.1...v0.10.2

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.10.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add GET routes for /history and /experimental-ocr; Refactor Sidebar.tsx by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/186

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.10.2...v0.10.3

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: DeepSeek Support (Ollama)
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/node to v22.13.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/188
  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript-eslint to v8.23.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/187
  • fix(deps): update module golang.org/x/sync to v0.11.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/190
  • chore(deps): update dependency go to v1.23.6 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/189
  • chore(deps): update golang docker tag to v1.23.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/191
  • fix(deps): update module github.com/tmc/langchaingo to v0.1.13-pre.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/192
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/193
  • Support reasoning models (deepseek-r1) in Ollama by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/194
  • chore(deps): update dependency testcontainers to v10.18.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/196
  • Update README: Revise features and env vars for DeepSeek integration by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/197

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.10.3...v0.11.0
